mapper.select: select a.* from (tpm_project)a,(select * from tpm_project_member where member_idx=#{member_idx})b where a.project_idx=b.project_idx

select * from (tpm_project)p,(tpm_category)c,(tpm_work)w,(tpm_checklist)ch, (select count(distinct c.category_idx)as category_num,count(distinct w.work_idx)as work_num,count(distinct ch.checklist_idx)as checklist_num from (tpm_project)p,(tpm_category)c,(tpm_work)w,(tpm_checklist)ch where p.project_idx=#{project_idx} and p.project_idx=c.project_idx and w.category_idx=c.category_idx and w.work_idx=ch.work_idx order by c.category_idx,w.work_idx,ch.checklist_idx ) where p.project_idx=#{project_idx} and p.project_idx=c.project_idx and w.category_idx=c.category_idx and w.work_idx=ch.work_idx order by c.category_idx,w.work_idx,ch.checklist_idx
